website_summaries.verdict: If you want a car battery charger that can be used wirelessly for optimal portability, this one is worth a look.
pros: Can charge a wide variety of batteries, including those in cars, motorcycles, and trucks
Has a built-in flashlight with SOS and strobe functions for added safety
cons: May not start batteries that are totally dead
Rare reports of the charger itself failing to hold a charge

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I did research for make present for my son on low and found this battery as a best choice. It has such a sweet rewiews and I decided order on for him and another one for me. Battery came at 60% charged. As so I charged for full value (24 hours) and tested for cellphone and lights. Works well. The body of battery like rubbered plastic. Looks solid. Light have few options. Bag include all described items. So far, I'm happy with my purchase. Update: Started my Nissan xTerra in a moment! Amazing Jump starter!
customer_reviews.author: dmitry koboy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Jump Starter
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this device, as I have owned a similar one from other vendor, and it could not jump start my truck. I had no choice but to get this device, since my battery was not holding chsrge if i left it without turning on fir more than 2 dsys. This device is great! It starts my truck effortlessly, and with minimal drain. I have stsrted my car over 20 times, when the Lead acid battery provides only clicks on my starter, and I have only charged the device once, when I received it. I am probably pushing my luck, but this device has worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Works great despite not being charged for a year and a half.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Gooloo a year and a half ago (January 2017). I charged it then put it in the trunk of a sports car I rarely use. Today my daughter called and asked me to jump-start her car. I grabbed the GooLoo, hooked up the cables to the car battery, plugged the other end into the Gooloo, and started the car. Instantly. After a year of not being charged (all the LED’s lit up when I turned it on). So I just bought another one to give to my daughter and her husband, and I may buy two more for the other two kids.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Goodheart

customer_reviews.title: GooLoo highly recommended Jump Starter
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd gooloo i purchased, 1 for each vehicle. I helped many folks who's battery were dead start their cars. the gooloo worked better then my old style jump box on my 2003 Ford Ranger started the truck with no problems. we never leave home without this in our vehicles. I highly recommend this product for everyone looking for a jump box. will definitely look at other GooLoo products. Pros: works every time I needed it . Cons: none
customer_reviews.author: Joe Luke

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it is supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: Had a friend use a similar started on my friend's mercedes and had to get one of my own. Keep it in my car and after sitting in there for almost 2 months one of the guys at my field project needed a jump and was asking around for jumper cables. Told them I had something better and walked over with this thing. They all looked at me like, "What the hell is that", but when the car started right up, they all wanted to know where to get one. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Scott-Mac NYC

customer_reviews.title: and nice carrying case
customer_reviews.text: The battery of my Mazda Protege5 was completely dead (power locks weren't even working). This GOOLOO jump starter got it started (after using the Boost button) twice, and the unit still indicated it had >80% charge left. Works as advertised as far as I can tell. Comes with a wall-charger cable, car-charger cable, and nice carrying case, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Hellrung

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but instructions not clear!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Instructions on how to use the device to jump start the car are not good i.e. it doesn’t explain that you first plug in the cable that has the battery connector clamps to port on the side, second you then connect the clamps to the battery, third push the boost button on the side, lastly you go and turn the key in your car to start it. Yes, you can figure out yourself for the most part, but to be confident with what you’re doing the instructions need to be simple with pictures. I went and watched a presentation on YouTube to be sure I was taking the right steps in order.
customer_reviews.author: Jared A. Dettmer

customer_reviews.title: 3 and down, no more
customer_reviews.text: This only was used twice and now will not recharge!! I need a replacement. It was my husbands gift and now after 3 uses it will not charge past the flashing one light! Can you exchange it??
customer_reviews.author: S. Dilmore

customer_reviews.title: Be aware if you have to take a flight
customer_reviews.text: I have to leave the item at the checkpoint in the airport. The authority didn't allow me to carry this item in the carry on neither in the documented luggage. With no use. The information of the seller here at Amazon and on its own web page do not mention nothing about that this item is dangerous. Lost money because of lack of information.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Best iPhone charger EVER.....as for jumping my Jag not so much. In fairness, even the tow truck driver had to work a little harder to jump my car. Update: I found myself in a situation where I needed to jumpstart an old 198? Ford 2500 Diesel truck and it worked!!! I had to hit the boost button, but that truck fired up!
customer_reviews.author: Saundra Noble

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical when I ordered this device, thinking it was too small and wouldn’t work as I’d expect.. boy was I wrong! This power pack was well built and does exactly what it’s described to do. My 06 Civic battery was completely drained for about 4-5 days, the car would not start. I was thinking about getting a new battery, but I figured I’d give this a shot first. Literally 1 minute after connecting it to the battery terminals and starting the car everything was good to go. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Devouy

customer_reviews.title: Cranks for 10-20 seconds
customer_reviews.text: The Gooloo battery is adequate to start my 2008 Toyota Tundra 5.8 liter (I left the bed light on so the truck's battery was very dead). However, I also have an old 1987 Toyota pickup which, when it hasn't been run for a couple of weeks, usually takes 20-30 seconds of cranking to start. The Gooloo ran out of juice before that vehicle started. While charging, I never saw the last light change from blinking to solid, which seems to indicate it never quite reached 100% charge, in spite of leaving it charging for a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: R Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Gooloo jump starter will not charge
customer_reviews.text: Received the Gooloo jump starter and charged for 12 hours using home adapter. Only got 1 blinking light. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: S J Ross

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited when I purchased this car battery charger because FINALLY I didn't have to wait for someone to give me a jump. Although I bought this item a while ago, I didn't have a chance to use it until today. Unfortunately, I was utterly disappointed because it wasn't strong enough to jump my car. I have a simple sedan and this battery charger didn't crank it up at all. I had to wait for someone with cables to jump my car (the exact thing that I tried to avoid by making this purchase). I did a lot of homework before deciding to buy this charger and unfortunately it didn't pan out. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery longevity and short jumper cables
customer_reviews.text: Initial complaint would be the length of the clamps, not much slack to work with when jumping side terminals on GMC/Chevy truck. Recent complaint, battery now holds maybe 1/4 of its original capacity after roughly 4 months. Pretty lame. Now I get why it was on sale. Recommend avoiding
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: DONOT buy this item! Expensive and without longevity!
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to use. Fussy process of setting up plug leads. Plug leads are too short. Charging cable/lead too short. Connectors do not open wide enough to properly connect onto battery terminals. Expensive for what you get. Smoked and died on the first day of use even though I followed all the directions for its setup perfectly. DONOT purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: FARID ALGHALI

customer_reviews.title: insufficient cranking power
customer_reviews.text: The battery in my 1500 Suburban was dead and this product was unable to turn over the engine. After jumping the old battery with another battery the engine immediately started. Because of the circumstances I must conclude the GOOLOO product did not have enough power to turn the engine over. Would like to exchange for more powerful model.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Moore

customer_reviews.title: Worst buy on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Since I have purchased this I have had two opportunities to use this device. The first opportunity was a big work truck. It failed to jump start the truck on a full charge. The second opportunity was today were at work a young lady need help. She has a tiny Nissan Sentra. Thinking this will work for the tiny little car. It failed to jump start the little car in a full charge. This is by far the worst buy I have made in Amazon. I do not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan dedios

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Bargain. Quality built piece of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Read the instructions completely. This is not a clip it to the battery and hit the ignition product. If you follow the process in the instructions it works great. I've used this 12 times without a problem. I recharge it after every use or every other month. It takes about 15 minutes for a maintenance charge and 2 hours after use. I slow charge it with a 2.5mlv usb charger so it doesn't heat up during charging.
customer_reviews.author: KTH.

customer_reviews.title: Warranty not honored. Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. This battery died before the warranty expired and could not hold a charge. I always kept this charged. Used it only two times. I reached out to customer service asking for a replacement and did not receive one. They simply said that you always need to keep this item charged which I did. My repeated contacts with the company were all left unanswered since. This product and company is a scam. Please learn from my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Long Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Won't work after the pre-built charge is down. Charging via wall charger doesn't help.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit 5 months back. It had a pre-built charge earlier. So charging it completely hardly took 4-5 hrs. I was able to successfully jump start my car multiple times after that. In COVID, my car battery was down because of using it for few weeks. Even the portable charge was down. Charging it with a wall-charger doesn't simply work. Even left it charging overnight. Doesn't help at all. Even the flashlight is not working. I got this in a deal. However, felt sad that why build such a product which can't work for even 6 months. I would rather pay double offering better reliability. Especially when we consider these as back-ups for critical use-cases.
customer_reviews.author: Piyush

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: This is an impressive unit. The charger itself has a soft coated exterior and looks really great. I know not the first attribute you care about when buying emergency equipment. The cables look high quality. It comes with a durable carrying case which is compact yet holds the unit and all the cables. I strongly recommend this unit. The most negative I have is the instructions. They are "Ikea-like" so you should read them now instead of waiting for an emergency. As a totally aside, you really should buy AAA roadside assistance. It has helped my family several times.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, I love it
customer_reviews.text: We were experiencing a lot of issues with the battery of our Honda Oddyssey 2018, we took it to the dealership and they never were able to fix it. In the mean time, we ran out of battery on this vehicle and sometimes with no enough space in our garage to charge it with our other vehicle. That is when I decided to buy this jump starter and I have to tell you that I just loved it. Super easy to use, it charge in second the dead battery of our car, super portable and you can also connect USB cables to charge your cell, etc. Excellent investment to have it as back up.
customer_reviews.author: Fer P.

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful enough for larger vehicles.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to keep in my van, since my battery is a little on the older side, with the winter coming, wanted to be prepared just in case.. I had to return it.. it was not powerful enough to jump start my Toyota sienna. It did however jump my Toyota CHR which is a very tiny car. A bit disappointed I feel it’s overpriced and misrepresented. Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Barbara CT

customer_reviews.title: Never was able to use it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the gooloo last year and was attempting to use it for the 1st time because my wife’s car battery died. Went to use it and it was dead, which is fine because it had been a while. However when I plugged it overnight it never took a charge. It’s a worthless brick now. Also I found the flash light button to be in poor location that would be easy to hit by accident. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This battery arrived just in time for me: my Subaru battery ran out of steam last weekend and I used this battery all week to start may Outback until I had time to figure out that I needed a new battery. From this point forward, I will always keep this rechargeable battery in my car. It is so much more convenient than my jumper cables. In fact, this battery will be under the xmas tree for many friends & relatives. It is an excellent product. Note: I have received NO compensation from the manufacturer of this device. My only complaint: I would really like to charge it through USBC.
customer_reviews.author: kaon

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously easy!  Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This little battery jump starter worked fantastic! Only a week after getting this, the inside light on my wife’s car was accidentally turned on and drained the battery. She went to go to work this morning (already running late) to discover that her car wouldn’t start. I ran down, grabbed the charger from my car, attached the clips to her car’s battery, saw a green light confirming that I had it on correctly, and told her to try to start her car. It started right up! Ridiculously easy and fast! As she was pulling out of the garage, she called back to me, “We’ll that purchase was totally worth it!”
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas H

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Product arrived with a 60% charge, took about 2 hours via the wall charger to get to 100%. Directions for use are pretty straightforward. Using the directed boost mode, I was able to jump start a dead battery on my rarely driven F150 truck. As a female senior, I will be keeping this in the trunk of one of my other vehicles in which the battery tends to die if I don't drive it regularly. I recommend this to everyone. No need to get a good Samaritan's help with battery issues, you can do it all on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: I have had this fully charged in my car for 6 months now. I didn't need it to charge my car but instead when I was lost and my phone went dead it saved me by giving my phone the extra juice it needed. You really don't realize how important and how much we depend on our phones until we can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: DobieMomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Saved me when I needed it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this sitting in my trunk for over a year now. I check it every few months but it stays fully charged. Gives me peace of mind. Today, a random guy asked me for help because his '97 Toyota Camry was dead. Hooked this thing up (fully charged), turned the key less than 20 seconds later, and it fired up immediately (cranked quickly, you wouldn't know it was being jumped)! He was amazed that this little battery just did that! Flashlight's decent in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: RS232 port

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last a year. Stay away
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a few months and no complaints. I mostly use it for my lawn mowers but I have needed it in a pinch for my cars. It's never let me down. I also use it as a portable battery bank which it has worked very well for too. Uodate: 3-1-2020 won't charge. I took a chance with typical Chinese crap and it was just that. Nowhere to contact the seller about this issue so I guess the "warranty" won't help. $80 to start my lawn mowers for one season. I'd stay away if I were you.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K

customer_reviews.title: Saved me
customer_reviews.text: My truck was having intermittent battery issues, so I figured I would try me one of these until I could get it to the shop, it really saved me a lot of trouble, I've had to use it at least 5 times in the past month, didn't even keep it charged up all the time either, and it always started my truck right up, not sure what to do now that I got a new battery, but it is very versatile, you can charge up anything with it, and it's flashlight is very bright, great deal
customer_reviews.author: RL.

customer_reviews.title: Won't jump start my car
customer_reviews.text: My car has been sitting for a while and I needed to jump my battery. I fully charged the unit overnight and it shows it's full. However, when I tried to jump start my car it did absolutely nothing. The green light shines when connected, indicating it is correct and ready to be jumped. It didn't even send enough power to make it click. Afterward I tried with my son's jump starter (different brand) and it worked immediately. I suggest you test out the jump started ability before you actually need it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Fine jump starter but with different jumper leads
customer_reviews.text: I like the capacity on this jump starter but it has a non-standard lead plug for the clamps. I like the standard jump connector because it allows me to use the cables that don't have the "protection" circuitry installed. With the protection circuit, if the battery is too low voltage, it will not allow the jumper to send power through the cables and I don't like that. All the jump boxes I've seen thus far have had the same connector which allows my cables to be used on all of them (except for this GOOLOO).
customer_reviews.author: Mike D

customer_reviews.title: 100% Better Than a Regular Phone Charger and A 12V Jump Starter
customer_reviews.text: I love It 100%. I brought mine for the charging of my phone and other electrical devices, and to this I'm 100% satisfied with the power this little box carries. I've a ZTE 981 Pro phone, and this have the capability of fully charging my phone 5-6 time (super fast) before recharging, and only need 5 hrs to fully recharge. I really don't need jumper cable's for my electric bicycle, but it's good to know I have the capability for that if the need should arrive. I almost can't wait for someone needing a jump, and when that day comes, I;ll be glad to write another review.
customer_reviews.author: Big Ivan

customer_reviews.title: You... Definitely... Want... This!
customer_reviews.text: This is, by far, an excellent product. I bought one of these early last year for myself. I managed to jump-start 5 vehicles with this thing (including 2 trucks) before I had to recharge it. It also seems to hold a 100% charge over the course of several months. I loved it so much, I bought one recently for my wife (the one I bought for her looks like the one in the description -- the specs are the same for the earlier one I bought for myself). You definitely want this product. I can't tell you how handy this is, compared to a pair of ordinary jumper cables!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin J. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months and haven't used it. I needed it only to find it dead. And now it won't charge. Big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bobo

customer_reviews.title: It don't work!
customer_reviews.text: Like the nice carrying case. Dislike it not being able to or crack my vehicle. The battery in my vehicle has been dead for about 5 months. The engine is a 3.0 liter engine. Let this instrument charge overnight it is fully charged and it does not measure anything at the output 0 volts. How can something that measures 0 volt crank a vehicle? Am I missing something
customer_reviews.author: T.terrible

customer_reviews.title: BEST COMPANY AROUND TO PURCHASE FROM!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this jump box in November 2018, just realized about 11 months later it wouldn't fully charge any more. I contacted GOOLOO directly and boom within 2 days they're sending me a new replacement. I will recommend this company to everyone I know. It's refreshing to know there are still companies out there that treat the customer well and take care of business. Great Job GOOLOO!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Martinez

customer_reviews.title: A well designed, performing product
customer_reviews.text: My wife's car was not used for the past 3 weeks with the state's stay at home order and thought it was about time to take it out for a quick spin. Pushed the start button, zip. Battery dead. Ordered this unit, got it next day from Amazon, charged it to full and attached it to the battery. Instant hum from the motor, no issues as I backed the car out of the garage and rode for about 30 minutes. Easy to use, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Worked for only a short time
customer_reviews.text: This worked great the two times I used it, within a couple months' time of purchase. Eight months into my ownership, it will not charge by either means--wall outlet or car lighter. I am hoping the company will contact me ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jump starter
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these for a long time now and this is the one that everyone ranted and raved about. I haven't had to use it yet but my friend has the exact same one and he has had to use his quite a few times and it has worked perfect so when I saw it on black friday for $45.00 I ordered it immediately. I hope I don't need it anytime soon but knowing that I have it just makes you feel safe especially out on the boat. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: MT Kopf

customer_reviews.title: Great, great product.
customer_reviews.text: I finally got to use this today when my car battery died (physical keys do not unlock doors, unfortunately) so I couldn't use my fob to get in my car. After jimmying my way in, I popped the hood, grabbed my Gooloo kit, attached the clamps and was up and running all under 30 seconds. After the jump, I checked the battery level and it still showed 5 dots so I expect I would get a lot of jumps out of one charge. This was a regular jump, not the BOOSTed jump. Very impressed with the reliability. I'll be buying one for each one of my sisters and my mom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My honest opinion
customer_reviews.text: This product is a piece of junk! Didn't last a year and never got to use it. I discovered it didn't work when I went to charge it one time and it wasn't taking a charge and showed only one blue light. Buyer beware and I will never buy another one from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Neocat

customer_reviews.title: Very good jumpstarter
customer_reviews.text: I'm ordered this jumpstarter from Amazon because I could get it fast to start my car that wouldn't start since it had been sitting in the garage for about 3 weeks. Usually, while teleworking, I crank my car about once a week to keep the battery charged, but this time I got busy and forgot. I got the jumpstarter the next day and I connected it and my car started immediately since it was fully charged when I got it. The instructions were clear and simple and I like the compact design along with the zippered storage for it...very nice and easily stores in my trunk or glove compartment. For the money, this was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Will not recharge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March 2019, and used it once. I recharged it every month, then forgot to recharge it 1 month, and now it won't recharge at all. I will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Moffat

customer_reviews.title: This tool saved my butt! Wish I could give this 20 stars...!
customer_reviews.text: A friend gave me the recommendation to purchase this jumper pack just in case of emergency and I ended up using it much sooner than anticipated. I was recently purchased a vehicle and began having battery issues soon afterwards. I couldn't get the vehicle to the dealership right away so I ended up using the jumper pack multiple times in one day as I made my way around town. Impressively, I used the pack for 4 jumps and the battery barely decreased. I would guess it only dropped ~20% for all those jumps on a small SUV. Amazing. I have been telling everyone I know to buy one of these and throw it in their vehicle. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K

customer_reviews.title: Clamp cables are not long enough.
customer_reviews.text: The clamps are too short to reach both terminals when jump starting my car under the hood versus jump starting the battery itself. I didn't try it before the return date so I can't return it. Need longer terminal cables for the clamps.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON

customer_reviews.title: Worked!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So actually had to use this the other night. Be sure to familiarize yourself with how it works before you need it. It was dark and cold, so reading instructions was not ideal. Did not work at first, but then read about the boost button (that is not easy to press-used pointy scissor I have in the car). Once I got boost pushed in the car started right up. So relieved and thrilled! Have one in all cars and a calandar reminder to charge them every few months.
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is phenomenal and charges pretty quick. Luckily I haven't had to use it yet, but I'm confident it will do its job. One thing I'd like to highlight is how long it kept its charge between the depletion cycle. I left home and didn't get a chance to recharge the unit for ten months and when I returned and turned it on to see how much charge was left, I was surprised it was well above half its charge capacity. I usually like to recharge every three months, but was very impressed it lasted 10 months before I was able to recharge the unit. I ended up buying a second unit.
customer_reviews.author: js34111

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY PLEASE! THIS DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE- THIS IS A PIECE OF JUNK! Bad product! Bad company! Unethical! It didn’t work when I wanted it to work! This is ridiculous! So mad 😡! PLEASE DON’T BUY THIS! DON’T RELY ON THIS! I AM SENDING IT BACK ASAP! OLD REVIEW - In the midst of this uncertain COVID-19 era, this backup battery is SUPER HELPFUL. So I don’t get stuck waiting for a tow truck in the middle of nowhere, I have kept this in my car. Be prepared ! BE safe!
customer_reviews.author: Raza

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS ARE NOT ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: I received this jump starter in last summer and as my car battery was in good condition, had no chance to test it. A couple of weeks ago my battery died, cos I hadn`t use my car for several days, because of pandemia and restrictions. I used my GOOLOO 800A Peak 18000mAh SuperSafe Car Jump Starter with USB Quick Charge 3.0 to start the engine and it worked in a FANTASTIC way. I have Volkswagen Passat 1.8 T and GOOLOO started the engine like a brand new car battery does. Very good job, guys, thanks to the seller. Would highly recommend to everybody who has a vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Archil Chkhartishvili

customer_reviews.title: Yes, Yes, and Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: Can I just say how much of a life saver this has been for me?? Last year whenever it got really cold my car would not start and I had to find a way to get to work. This year in January I bought this jump start and charged over night just in case. My car hasn't started twice this year. Pulled out this jump starter both times and it starts my car after about 30 seconds!! I love this and it's so worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: It saved me already multiple times
customer_reviews.text: After my car sat in the garage for three months, the battery was basically dead. I had it jump-started by AAA twice (and they used a portable device just like this one). But the battery kept dying on me even after multiple 20+ mile trips. So, I was glad that I could now start the car again wherever I was. Now, two months later, the battery seems to have been revived. But without this GOOLOO jump starter, I would have had to buy a new one. Now, I have a battery that works like a new one and still the safety of the jump starter. It is well worth the peace of mind that I got from it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I bought another as a fit for a friend. I had a chronically dead battery (my whole electrical system sucked). As soon as I turned my car off, there was no charge whatsoever. No clicking, no dimmed lights, no nothing. Clip this thing on (it won’t let you do it backwards), and in thirty seconds my car started like a dream. It can also be used several times before needing to recharge it. Also has USB ports for charging your phone and a flashlight/distress signal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Step

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery backup power source
customer_reviews.text: This is a versatile jump starter with a flashlight and two charging USB ports. This charges, slowly, though, which requires an overnight recharge for me. I took it with me to India to keep my iPad and iPhone charged while traveling in country. This is very easy to operate and has an LED indicator to show the remaining battery life. It charges an iPad twice or an iPhone 3 times, roughly. The size is a touch cumbersome, and is not ideal for pocket carry, but it goes into a side pocket for a bookbag. This comes with a carrying case with accessory attachments. Overall, it is a solid system for backup power or for jumping a vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle VisionTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you own a car.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I spent a lot of time recently installing new things in my car and would frequently forget to turn off the dome light and kill my battery. I can go from 0 charge so low I can’t even unlock my doors wirelessly, to pulling this out and getting the car started in less than 2 minutes. I thought I’d only get a jump or two but I’ve used it on friends and my car probably 5 times and it still has over half charge. I’m so happy I have it. It’s freaking convenient and makes me feel a lot better about going on extended solo camping trips alone.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: I would like to tell anyone who is looking to buy a charge starter for their car or truck that this little gem is so powerful and worth every dollar..ive been having problems every 2 days I would go out and my car wouldn't start..i can't find the draw on my battery, but let me me tell you that I read all the feedbacks on this item before I decided to buy it and everyone really STEERED me to the right choice..thanks to everyone...
customer_reviews.author: nina Durward

customer_reviews.title: Starts my car!
customer_reviews.text: My 22yr old car's 11 yr old battery is too weak to start the car, but will continue to operate fine once the car is running. I'm getting rid of the car and don't want to buy a new battery, so I bought this jumper battery instead and then my wife can use it to jump her car when she or my kid drains my wife's car battery. It doesn't crank as energetically as a brand new car battery, but it motor cranks and starts (that's without the boost function active). I haven't tried it with the boost function active yet.
customer_reviews.author: ppc user

customer_reviews.title: Wrong polarity detection does not work
customer_reviews.text: I had to jump start my vehicle in the dark late at night. I looked at the polarities and thought I had it right, but I wasn't terribly worried where it has polarity detection to warn you before you try a jumpstart. After I checked everything else I pushed the little button to prep it for jump-starting. As soon as I did, I heard a sustained electrical zap in the device. Now, it's totally dead and will not do anything--no light, no indicators, nothing. Yes, it was an error on my part, but the features are not as advertised so do beware.
customer_reviews.author: The Maine Shank

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Energy When You Need It
customer_reviews.text: A couple of years ago I bought this battery pack but it died this winter. I'd normally be disappointed but when I think back to the service it has given me I'm very pleased with it. It has started my F-150 which was dead last winter when I returned from a long vacation - I'd left the bed light on (duh). It has started my tractors endless times saving me miles of walking to get a jumpstart. It has recharged my iPhone countless times when travelling - maybe 500x. Plus a very strong flashlight as a bonus. I love the multiple outlets. I can recharge several items at once. It was a natural choice to choose this product again.
customer_reviews.author: M. McMullen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have used this so many times. I have a Lexus. Great car, but battery tanked. I had too tight of a schedule to be able to get a battery, for a whole week.binused this several times a day to start my car, during that week. It never failed. I didn't have to recharge the unit the whole time. I've used it to help others who were stranded. People are always amazed. I've used it to charge my phone also. I LOVE IT. Its been unused for a good six months, Soni checked it a couple days ago . . . It was fully charged. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: Step Lively

customer_reviews.title: Does what it needs to!! 5/5
customer_reviews.text: Let my '14 Subaru WRX STi sit for about a month as it's not my daily for work. Car was dead and jumped right up. Next day it made a clicking noise and I jumped it again. **BE CAREFUL THOSE WITH TUNES ON VEHICLE ** and read the instructions carefully because the second time starting from this doesnt need the extra volts it affected my tune on my vehicle as I had overdone it and my check engine light came on it was e85 fuel injector and something else. Reinstalled my extra tune I had saved on my Cobb access port and was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Work as it should.
customer_reviews.text: Tested it out this morning. Customer complained about a no start. I was very skeptical at first. But it was a easy plug in play. The pack jumped started the car with no problems perfectly. I like the feature it has. The flashlight is not that powerful but it gets the job done and useful for emergencies like lost in the woods. End of story. It works. Tested on a dead Nissan Sentra 2018. Aug update - jump started trucks like frontiers and NV2500 which are 6.5Ls. No struggle at all. I'm amazed. No more of those bulky jump boxes anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Anon1

customer_reviews.title: We have bought 6 over the past year. Handy for more than jump starting a car.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these four of these for gifts because we have found them so useful. We have used them on our boats and cars. No maneuvering cars so cables reach, no broken knuckles yanking batteries out of obscure places in the boats and provided incredible power backup post hurricane for our cell phones and iPad. My husband has used his to jump start several stranded people in parking lots and all of them wanted to know more about the product. The cranking power is awesome, even a big pick up truck is no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Bought the GOOLOO 800A Peak a while back put it away and forgot I bought it. Needed to charge my riding mower this summer so I got it out read the directions, and charged it. Was skeptical that it would really work since it is so small. Hooked it up to my riding mower, turned the key and it started the first time. I really underestimated the GOOLOO. I has a lot of power for such a small charger and it is so compact it will fit in the glove compartment of any vehicle. Highly recommend the GOOLOO for anyone who travels long distance especially someone who travels alone.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Howard

customer_reviews.title: Gooloo Jump starter can be used to power other 12 volt devices
customer_reviews.text: Great product ( I haven't tried to see if it will start a car but I have used it to partly inflate all my truck tires from 35 to 40 PSI using a 12 volt tire inflator. It filled all 4 times (about 5 minutes total) and LED charge light never dropped from 4 (full charge). So much nicer to fill tires without having to run compressor wire to inside lighter socket. No cigarette lighter female socket was supplied so I made a jumper (12 volt jack is 2.1 mm x 5.5mm) connected to 12 volt cigarette lighter female and I store it in the case that comes with the GOOLOO Jump starter.(See Above)
customer_reviews.author: Denise St

customer_reviews.title: Fought Covid-Fatigue And Won!
customer_reviews.text: TLDR: -- Covid = work from home + social distancing = not driving much -- Not driving much = dead battery -- dead batter + this thing here (look up) = got my car started = life good again Good: -- portable -- simple to use Bad: -- no complaints as of 2020.09.01
customer_reviews.author: Al C.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't be without it!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best investment. I have had to use it to jumpstart other people's cars because they didn't have one and didn't have jumper cables. It worked like a charm. Takes up much less room than jumper cables, and can be used as a flashlight/emergency strobe, and to charge USB devices. Super handy. And it is nice to know I have it just in case I need it. I feel safer knowing I (or my daughter) wouldn't have to approach a stranger if our battery were dead. Stays with a full charge for a surprisingly long time, too. I wouldn't be without it!
customer_reviews.author: DELSLP

customer_reviews.title: Great Power Pack and Jumpstarter
customer_reviews.text: The design does make it look clunky and it's on the larger side so it's not very "portable" (carrying around in your pocket). I can't speak for how well it jump starts a car, since I never had to use it for that but I imagine it would work since it charges my devices multiple times without any problem. My only complaint is the blue led light (batter level indicator) is pretty bright and there's no way to turn it off (you have to wait until it times out). It comes with a nice carrying case that fits all the wires, perfect to just throw in trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago, after I left my keys in the ignition too long and killed my battery. It looks as promised, and the first thing to do, is to charge it and make sure it's 100%. There are light indicators and the manual will tell you what each light means in terms of percentage. I've used it quite a few times on my own car which is a compact sedan, and it does the job every time. I've even used it on my bf's car, and he has a full sized sedan. I keep it in my trunk, and just take it out when needed. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my Honda Civic
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work. I tried it twice on my car, followed the instructions exactly and it didn’t work. I had to get a manual jump from another car. I’m giving it two stars instead of 1 though bc the design is great and has good features and everything and others say it works. But it didn’t for me.
customer_reviews.author: mexiboy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! You’ll be glad to have it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to have on hand in case he needed it. He wasn’t that thrilled with this Christmas present (haha) but one day he called me after work to say how amazing it is and how thankful he was to have it! His car wouldn’t start and he was the last employee left - he remembered he had this and was able to jump his car easily. He said it was really user friendly and he didn’t even have to read the instructions. It should be noted that you can also use this to charge your phone/laptop/etc. I just bought another one for my dad for Father’s Day!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: 3 car jump and that’s before it’s first recharge.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for how small it is. Car in garage has not moved in 2 month and battery was dead. This started the car right up! Then two weeks later car was drained again since I didn’t move it or left battery on car charging and again worked like a charm. I still have not recharge the battery booster mind you. My brother called and his daughters Jeep was parked in a way that a car wouldn’t not be able to jump charge so took this bad boy over and again started Jeep right up. Three car jumps before it’s first recharge.
customer_reviews.author: -LeiNaD-

customer_reviews.title: A "Must have" for Auto travelers!!
customer_reviews.text: I feel more secure driving long distances in remote locations knowing I have reserve electrical power for my car battery and accessories, and other electrical devices such as cell phones. Twice in the past year, my electrical power failed while on the road. If I had a Gooloo with me, I would have saved time and money getting restarted! The Gooloo also comes in handy for powering other devices when power isn't readily available such as on a boat or in the woods!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Instructions a little confusing.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to jump my car battery which had gone flat because I haven’t been driving enough to keep it charged. I got it delivered the next day and after about 5 hours of charging was ready to go. The manual is a little confusing but it’s really easy to use. In one place it says to connect the booster to the battery and wait for the light to turn green. There was no green light so I looked at the manual again and in a different spot it gave different instructions that didn’t mention the green light. So I connected it again, turned the ignition and my car started right up.
customer_reviews.author: Shaggles

customer_reviews.title: This one saves me often from annoying troubles. I can use this one to charge ...
customer_reviews.text: Instead of buying a new battery which costs me more than $140, I bought this one. As I still recall in the old days when we tried to jump start a cold car, just way too much trouble. This one makes life so much easier. It is very small, contact, contains huge power. I felt so confident now when I drive. I work at home, don't have many chances to use my car. This one saves me often from annoying troubles. I can use this one to charge my phone too. Really appreciate the benefits brought by the technology!
customer_reviews.author: Spemin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Actually works on car batteries
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that something so small could start a car. Finally, after using several months to just charge my phone, I got to use it on someone's car. Worked instantly. Being a motorcycle rider, it was important to have something small enough to take in any size vehicle. Pros: has a light, compact, can charge the phone multiple times, convenient storage case, includes charger for both car and home, boost charge available if needed. Con: I had to buy the connector for my portable pump separately.
customer_reviews.author: Ramfla

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I plugged the charger in overnight to make sure it was fully charged. The next day I attempted to start my wife's car, which would not start using jumper cables. I hooked charger up, waiting ten seconds and the car started on the first try. My wife mistakenly turned the car off when we got to the mechanic's, she had not parked the car yet; again it started her car on the first try, using the GOOLOO. In addition to jumper starting your vehicle, it has a bright emergency light on it, will charge USB items and cell phones, along with other additional items. Works great and is value priced, what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Works well and easily. Can't be left in the car.
customer_reviews.text: To make it work, press the little "boost" button on the adapter built into the charging cable, not just the big red button. It started my small car instantly. Biggest drawback is that it has to be stored indoors. Why, I don't know, but I assume it has to do with the temperature. So, when we travel we keep it in a bag with other items inside the car and indoors when we arrive. It has a built-in flashlight and can be used to charge a variety of devices.
customer_reviews.author: writeon1

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WHILE IT STILL ABLE TO BE CHARGED.
customer_reviews.text: There was no complains while it charged and jumpstarted my car numerous time. However, after 2 years, the battery now no longer holds any charges when use with the originally wall plug that came with the device. Then I noticed that the customer warranty is only 18 months, which explains how the product's life cycle might only be designed for at most 24 months. I would save my money and some other pack to see if this is a consistent problem for product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kp0906sjsjsj

customer_reviews.title: It's necessary
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that should be in everyone's vehicle. Don't know about you, but I can't live without it now. I live in Chicago, and winters here are cold, snowy and brutal. My sister's car didn't start in December,I put the Gooloo Jump Starter on her battery and BAM, the car started right up. I took her car to the parts store and bought a new battery. When I came out of the parts store, her car didn't start again, put the Gooloo back on the dead battery and BAM, started right up. Don't wait until your car's battery fails, get a Gooloo now.
customer_reviews.author: Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, you need this!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I bought this a year ago, charged it, & threw it in my “emergency bag” in my trunk. Haven’t thought about it until this morning when my car wouldn’t even tick when I tried to turn it on. I took it out of the case, read the instructions in less than a minute, hooked it up to my battery, and my car started immediately! I really couldn’t be happier with the purchase, I’m going to buy more of them for the rest of my family right now!
customer_reviews.author: Sink

customer_reviews.title: The battery was not able to start my car after multiple tries.
customer_reviews.text: The battery to my Lexus IS250 was dead and I bought this to try jump starting because the car was in the garage and I did not have cables long enough to just with my other vehicles. I followed the instructions and tried multiple times. The battery could not start my car. Then I remember AAA has battery service and he came out and used his old jump starter and got my car running in seconds. Lots of good reviews but not sure if my was defective so I decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: AD Shocker

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to jumpstart our car and get some juice for our electronics after a prolonged camping in the woods. Sturdy but compact built, It nicely shashes away with the rest of the gear. Instructions are well-written and easy to follow. If you have a pulse, you'll be able to use this product. Wattage is enough for 3-4 jumps. We regularly chanrge it every quarter. Saved us already a few buck in towing b/c of an old battery.
customer_reviews.author: Teamleader100

customer_reviews.title: Cheap pastic cables & thin cords
customer_reviews.text: It works VERY WELL is why i gave 4 stars.... The parts are cheaply made (cables & thin cords). Cable cord made with thin plastic. Use gently or You know its life span is short.
customer_reviews.author: Thais

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Just took it out after sitting for 2 months, and jumped a completely DEAD battery on a 4.0L engine truck. Then, proceeded to jump 2 other cars that had been sitting for a few months without needing to recharge. Passes the test for me. Product looks and feels great. The provided case is great too, a similar one might cost and extra $10-20 from other products that don't give you a nice one. My only complaint is that it give the otherwise very portable charge much larger footprint. However, it does a good job of keeping all the necessary accessories together so I guess it's necessary.
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great, still going strong, DON'T GET THE YELLOW 20K mAh GOOLOO
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for over 2 years now and have used it numerous times to jump start my cars after kids left lights on or batteries were on their last legs. It's still going strong. I liked this one so much I got the upgraded 20K mAh yellow GOOLOO with the LCD screen which was BIG MISTAKE. That one died in less than a year but this older one is going strong probably because simpler is better. I'll be replacing that one with another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Homer

customer_reviews.title: Started my 2014 Silverado truck
customer_reviews.text: I received it a couple of days ago and just used it for the first time. My truck is having battery issues as of late and I needed something small and quick to jump start it. When I went to start it all I heard was a clicking sound, I attached the Gooloo (which is a simple process) maybe a half a minute later I turned the ignition on and it fired right up. Very pleased with its performance, had to use it again today with the same results. I have a 6 cyl. 4.3 chevy engine for people who want to know.
customer_reviews.author: Dan M

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from being stranded in a pandemic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I always like to be prepared for everything. I bought this for the “just in case” moments. I went to a doctor appointment and my battery died while I was there. This was during the COVID-19 outbreak while we were all in quarantine. Chances of help coming 0%. I am a young female with only very basic knowledge of cars. This was SO EASY TO USE!!! I definitely recommend one of these for everyone to have on hand. It can also be used as a phone charger and flashlight as well.
customer_reviews.author: K teach & mom

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I needed a jump and called a wrecker service and instead of pulling out jumper cables they brought out one of these. It worked right away and I thought it was so cool I bought one. Last week we had some people over and when they went to leave they found that their battery was dead. So rather than move our cars around and hook up cables, I let everyone know I've got this covered. Pulled out the GOOLOO, inserted the connectors, hooked it up, got the green light and told them to start it, and it fired right up. Everyone thought I was a wizard and they all wanted to know where I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Hovius

customer_reviews.title: Included charger not included
customer_reviews.text: It said it came with a wall charger and a car charger had to be bought separately. Well mine came with a car charger that didn’t work, not a wall charger, and it doesn’t charge via USB as stated, so it worked well for a weekend on a camping trip to jump the vehicle and charge my phone, but now it’s basically a paper weight. Not worth the money to only get one use out of it. Seems like a cool concept that I really wanted to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably compact and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Hyundai Elantra, girlfriend has a Prius. Didn't want to risk damaging her battery/computer system with a jump, so bought this cheap little guy and wow. I don't read instructions so it did take a minute for me to figure out I needed to press the little "boost" button before starting the car, but when I did it started perfectly. My car has been sitting in the driveway since March because of Covid19, so this was a great buy. I can pass it on to my teenage daughter so I don't have to worry about her ever being stranded with a dead battery relying on a stranger for a jump. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Did away with need for jumper cables or an overnight battery charger
customer_reviews.text: I had a riding mower that had no charge in the battery after setting all winter. After fully charging the Jump Starter, I connected it to the battery and the mower started on the first try. It worked as if the mower battery was fully charged. The jump starter also check the mower battery to be sure it was ok. I am very happy with this purchase and will keep it in my car for any future emergencies. Will recommend to anyone who asks.
customer_reviews.author: sjm

customer_reviews.title: EDIT: IT WORKS on 2000 Ford V8 4.6L Cargo Van
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Changed to 5-stars .. definitely works on the cargo van. I ended up having a bad terminal and swapped it out from autozone ($4.99) and I was good to go! I was jumping directly from this while troubleshooting my problem. It’s amazing. I edited my review just bc I realized the terminal connection went bad. 06/25/19 Does not jump 2000 Ford E150 Cargo Van V8 engine. I bought it specifically because it says that it can jump the larger engines. It is misleading and doesn’t work. Going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Swat Khan

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This starter has to be one of the best purchases I had in a while. It's compact, simple to use and best of all...it works. I started my 98 Chevy S-10 6Cylendar truck when the battery died. So much easier than having to jump-start from our other car. I love the LED light and the available USB charging ports though I have not used ports yet. This thing really works like they say it does. Good price and super fast shipping. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: abbottchapel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent; Every Car Should Carry One
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 of these for Dominican friends in the Dominican Republic. Both have had need to use them to start their car in order to get to work or home from out of town. Both swear by this device. As far as they are concerned, every car should carry one Much better than carrying jump cable and having to find someone to help you They take little space in the car and are easy to use, Anyone can learn to use it in case of need.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Depree

customer_reviews.title: Saved me in a desperate situation!
customer_reviews.text: I have two vehicles, a Ford Focus and a Dodge Carvan...Both batteries went down on the same day! I ordered this unit and it was delivered in two days. I put it on charge and boosted both vehicles in less than 15 minutes, on one charge! I wasn't aware of the smart carry case that comes with this unit, but it is perfect to store everything away in my car. If you own a vehicle, you need to get this. It's so simple to use. And easy to store away. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donald H. Crum

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible product! Was skeptical when ordered, as it was a gift for parents, who have an SUV. They always get the light handle out of position, on the steering column, and when they leave the vehicle the lights remain on and....you got it, I get a call to jump start! They have used it twice and instant start! Need to recharge after 2 uses. Definitely buying more as gifts! James Mc Mechanicsburg PA
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jump start/charger
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t get any easier to use than this. Charged it up and it sat in my car for 2 months till a friend needed a jump. Hook it up, push one button and started his car twice and still shows a full charge. I will never be without this charger/starter. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Moosebreath

product_meta.title: GOOLOO 1200A Peak 18000mAh SuperSafe Car Jump Starter with USB Quick Charge 3.0 (Up to 7.0L Gas or 5.5L Diesel Engine), 12V Portable Power Pack Auto Battery Booster Phone Charger Built-in LED Light
feature_bullets: POWERFUL LIFE SAVER: This GOOLOO emergency jump starter has enough power (1200A peak current) to jump start most 12 volt vehicles on the road! (up to 7.0L gas or 5.5L diesel engines) Works with cars, motorcycles, watercrafts, ATVs, UTVs, SUVs, lawn mowers, yachts, boat, pickup,snowmobiles, etc. Fully charges in 5 hours and can hold a charge for more than 3 months.

QUICK-CHARGE USB PORTS: Designed with dual USB outputs (5V/2.1A, 5V 2.4A/9V 2A), the quick-charge 3.0 USB port charges your devices faster and is compatible with almost all USB charging devices – including cell phones, tablets, Kindles or digital cameras. Charging is fast and efficient – helping you save time.

ADVANCED PROTECTION TECHNOLOGY: The intelligent jumper clamp features multiple advanced safety technologies including over-current protection, overload protection, over-voltage protection, over-charge protection and high-temperature protection – ensuring it’s safe for anyone to use.
LED FLASHLIGHT: The LED work light has 3 modes: Flash Light, Strobe Light and SOS Light. This multi-purpose flashlight is great for camping, outdoors, indoors, emergencies, travel, etc.

WHAT’S INCLUDED: 1 x GOOLOO Ultra Compact Automotive Jump Starter GP37-Plus, 1 x Smart Jumper Clamp, 1 x Wall Charger, 1 x Car Charger, 1 x USB to Type-C Cable, 1 x Carry Bag, 1 x User Manual. Please do not repeatedly start the large engine size car in short time

specifications.Special Features: √ Quick Charging 3.0 USB Output: 5V/2.4A , 9V/2A; √ 12 volt DC outlets can power suitable accessories; √ The charge indicators are useful additions, so you can see when your jump starter needs charging; √ The equipped case is very solid and can withstand daily impacts and scratches; √ Battery Life: 1000+ Cycles; ? Customer Service: ?Warranty: We provide 12+6 months warranty lifetime technical support
specifications.Vehicle Service Type: ATV, UTV, Dirt Bike, Snowmobile, Adventure, Personal Watercraft
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,973 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars

categories: Jump Starters, Battery Chargers & Portable Power
